name: Asha
desc: A mechanic exclusive to the Easybreeze Holiday Resort in Natlan similar to Saurian Indwelling that helps the player explore the map and complete puzzles using the form of an Asha.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffffa6>Asha can be indwelled much like Saurians can, through either possessing an Asha or using a</color> <color=#ffe14b>Spiritsconce</color> <color=#ffffffa6>. They assist the player in exploration through various skills that allow map traversal and interaction with painting puzzles.</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Asha exist only in the Easybreeze Holiday Resort in Natlan and if a player indwelling an Asha leaves the area, they will be ejected.</color>

<color=#ffffffa6>Much like Saurians, Asha can be indwelt through either the Asha themselves or through their spiritsconce. Whilst Asha</color> <color=#ffe14b>Spiritsconces</color> <color=#ffffffa6>and indwelling icons may appear different, they function the exact same way as the Saurians.</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Tutorial:</color>

<color=#ffffff>Normal attack</color> <color=#ffffffa6>: Replaced by throwing</color> <color=#ffe14b>paintballs</color> <color=#ffffffa6>to paint objects. This attack does no damage!</color>
<color=#ffffff>Jump</color> <color=#ffffffa6>: Performs a small jump. Holding the button will allow for a higher jump!</color>
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Skill</color> <color=#ffffffa6>: The Asha grapples in a direction, and is pulled towards that point. This can be aimed by holding down the skill button. This can be used again in midair. When hold is done midair, Asha will stay fixed in the air to allow you to aim where you want to go.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Dash</color> <color=#ffffffa6>: Asha can consume Phlogiston at a rapid rate to move quickly.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Other Abilities</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Asha can walk and dash on water.</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Asha can run up walls.</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Asha can paint objects. Painting can also be done whilst hovering in the air by simply pressing the attack button whilst midair. Shooting</color> <color=#ffe14b>paintballs</color> <color=#ffffffa6>consumes paint gauge, and will be depleted when attacking continuously. This will recharge after Asha stops attacking. Invisicolor does not have a gauge.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Paint colors</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>The player will start with 4 colors (Red, Blue, Yellow and Grey) and Invisicolor. Players will then gradually unlock the rest through certain quests and puzzles in Easybreeze Holiday Resort (Orange, Purple and Green).</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>These quests and puzzles to unlock these colors are:</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Orange:</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Green: Talking to an NPC named</color> <color=#ffe14b>Kanei</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, then completing the challenge he sets.</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>The mechanisms can be interacted with during the</color> <color=#ffe14b>Indwelt State</color> <color=#ffffffa6>as a Asha.</color>

<color=#ffffffa6>Certain areas in Easybreeze Holiday Resort are covered in white spots, allowing players to paint over them. Oftentimes when this is completed, the player will be rewarded!</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Tutorial:</color>

<color=#ffffffa6>Players will have access to "Invisicolor Paintballs" along with their colors, this can clean off dirty marks as well as paint.</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Tutorial:</color>

<color=#ffffffa6>Adding color to these small fish will activate them. Follow these fish till the end for rewards!</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Tutorial:</color>

<color=#ffffffa6>Like their smaller cousins, these colossal fish are also activated by painting them. Asha can attach themselves to these to move alongside them.</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Tutorial:</color>

<color=#ffffffa6>Players can paint the Chroma Kite to follow it into the sky!</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Tutorial:</color>

<color=#ffffffa6>Players can paint Chroma Rollers to move them forwards and help decorate the area with flowers.</color>
Tutorial:

<color=#ffffffa6>Players can help guide an Asha to the end of a trial. This is done by commanding Saurians along the route and painting arrows.</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Tutorial:</color>

imgDesc.text:
Strange Monetoo that exhibit both a passion and talent for pigments. They can be found around the Easybreeze Holiday Resort and display an affinity for spiritual perception that is unusual among their kin from other regions â€” they can even be indwelt via Spiritspeaking.
When you indwell one, you will be able to throw <color=#ffe14b>paintballs</color> forward to attack or as a means of painting. Hold to enter aiming mode.

Asha can dash in short bursts. Hold the dash button to choose the desired destination for your dash. You can also hold Jump to jump higher. When an Asha is in the air, you can hold to aim their <color=#ffe14b>paintballs</color> . While aiming, your Asha will remain suspended in midair until the next time you press the Jump button.
Asha can change the color of their paintballs at any time. They can also switch to "Invisicolor" paintballs that will remove any other colors they cover.

value.name: Saurian Indwelling and Mimesis
value.desc: A Natlanese mechanism for both exploration and combat that allows the player to take the form of Saurians and their abilities.
